com.scvngr.levelup.core.net

Class RequestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.RequestUtils

  • @LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public final class RequestUtils
extends Object
    Class with methods to help with creating requests.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String HEADER_ACCEPT
      Header key for the accepts.
      static String HEADER_CONTENT_TYPE_JSON

      Header key that maps to the model of the current device.

      Header value representing the model of the current device.

        @Deprecated
public static final String PARAM_CLIENT_ID
        Deprecated.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultRequestHeaders

        public static Map<String,String> getDefaultRequestHeaders(Context context)
        Get the request headers for all API requests.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        the headers to add to the request.

      • getUserAgent

        public static String getUserAgent(Context context)
        Returns a String representation to use as the User-Agent string when communicating with the server. A sample string looks like:

        "LevelUp/2.3.12 (Linux; U; Android; 1.0; generic_x86/sd_x86; en-US;) LevelUpSdk/0.0.1".

        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        the user agent value.

      • getApiKey

        public static String getApiKey(Context context)
        Get the API key for the context passed.
        Parameters:
        context - the Application context.
        Returns:
        The API key from resources.

      • getDeviceId

        public static String getDeviceId(Context context)
        Gets the deviceId to add to the login/register requests.
        Parameters:
        context - the Application context.
        Returns:
        the deviceId or null if it couldn't be determined.

      • addApiKeyToRequestQueryParams

        public static void addApiKeyToRequestQueryParams(Context context,
                                 Map<String,String> params)
        Add the API key to the request query parameters.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        params - the query parameter Map to add the API key to.

      • addApiKeyToRequestBody

        public static void addApiKeyToRequestBody(Context context,
                          JSONObject body)
        Add the API key to the request body.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        body - the JSONObject to add the API key to.

      • addDeviceIdToRequestBody

        public static void addDeviceIdToRequestBody(Context context,
                            JSONObject body)
        Add the Device ID to the request body if the Device ID can be determined. The request body is not modified if the Device ID could not be determined.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        body - the JSONObject to add the Device ID to
